about_the_game:
Did you ever dare to imagine that within this bleak, frigid world lies a realm of enchantment? Concealed in the obscure corners of this world, you'll find the undead, specters, and the mystical arts.

Embrace the mantle of a mighty Mage and confront the enchanted undead, phantoms, and the sinister Dark Mages.

"You bear a momentous destiny, and now, it beckons you to follow its course."
These were the words inscribed on the card from your uncle on your 16th birthday.

Within your uncle's gift, you discovered a box containing a modest wand and a link to a YouTube video.

Now, you must unravel the mystery surrounding your uncle's supposed demise, as your mother recounted...



Magic becomes your newfound path.



Picture enveloping yourself in a shroud of flames, rendering you untouchable, or conjuring a swarm of bees to assail any obstacle in your way.

Your selection among five Schools of Magic opens up a world of possibilities. Summon a diverse array of servants to battle on your behalf, unleash potent fireballs, draw stones from the heavens, and channel lightning.

The choice is yours regarding the type of sorcerer you wish to become: Fire, Earth, Water, Air, or Metal. Each element boasts its own repertoire of distinctive spells.

Certain elements prove highly effective against specific foes, while others are ineffectual.

Should you tread the Path of Fire, you shall command spells such as The Circle of Fire or summon the formidable minion known as The FireLord.

Begin your journey by mastering basic spells, and progressively, ascend to command ever more formidable incantations.

Behold "Falling Skye," a spell that sends stones plummeting from the heavens to crush your adversaries.



Over time, you'll acquire diverse wands to empower your spellcasting. However, the true treasures are the Crystals, excavated from the depths beneath the earth, each bestowing distinct abilities.



Once your training is complete, you'll embark on the genuine adventure, encountering increasingly perilous adversaries. These formidable foes wield potent spells and summon monsters to fight by their side.

Upon finishing your training, you have the option to restart the game as a new wizard at a higher level. This choice allows you to explore various mage archetypes, testing your mettle and determination to conquer the game in a novel way.

Alternatively, you can immerse yourself in GOD Mode, where the limits of your power know no bounds.
